DESCRIPTION: Frozen cards are #yUnplayable and #yRetain. At start of your turn, gain #b2 block for each Frozen card in hand.
Cast this Spell once again after it's effects take place, then reduce Echo by #g1.
Exhaust a card and add #yAshes to your discard pile.
When a #yFrosted target takes damage all enemies lose HP equal to #yFrost, and #yFrost decreases.
When a #yBlazed creatures attacks they lose HP, and #yBlazed decreases by half.
When a #yMired creatures receives Attack damage you heal #g2 HP, then decrease #yMired by #b1
#yShocked creatures lose #b50% of their block at the end of their turn, then #yShocked decreases by #b1.
Electrified cards cost 1 less Energy, and when played, deal you #r2 (blockable) damage per stack, then lose Electrified.
Deals #g2 extra base damage per stack, exhausts on use.
Playing a #ySpell adds it to the Casting area. Reduce #yN by #b1 at the start of your turn for all your Casting spells. The Spell's effects occur when #yN is #b0.
Reduce the casting time of your #ySpell Cards for each stack of #yShortened #yChant
Multiple copies of the same spell will only count as one unique spell.
Whenever you #yElectrify a card, the enemy loses HP equal to Lightning Rods.
Move Spells backwards in your Casting Queue.
Move Spells forwards in your Casting Queue.
Until next turn, make an #yIce #yShard in hand whenever you play a Spell. Next turn, don't lose #bblock at start of turn.
Until next turn, whenever you play a Spell gain #b1 Energy.
